description: Veteran Hector Duff comes face to face with the war vehicle he once drove in a 101st birthday surprise.
title: Manx Desert Rat reunited with Daimler Dingo in birthday surprise
title_page: Manx Desert Rat reunited with Daimler Dingo in birthday surprise - BBC News
maintext: When a brigadier came under heavy fire while checking to see how far the German army had advanced, he parked his vehicle in full view of the enemy soldiers and managed to hold off the attack.
